Hydrilium hatchet

A hatchet made from the rare underwater material called hydrilium.

The Hydrilium hatchet item is a crafted item.

Requirement

  • At least Woodcutting lvl. 45.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

+13% Work efficiency While doing Woodcutting.

+16% Work efficiency While doing Woodcutting.
+25% Chest finding While doing Woodcutting.
+1% Double action While doing Woodcutting.
+3% Double rewards While doing Woodcutting.
+19% Find bird nests While doing Woodcutting.

+20% Work efficiency While doing Woodcutting.
+40% Chest finding While doing Woodcutting.
+2% Double action While doing Woodcutting.
+6% Double rewards While doing Woodcutting.
+30% Find bird nests While doing Woodcutting.

+26% Work efficiency While doing Woodcutting.
+45% Chest finding While doing Woodcutting.
+4% Double action While doing Woodcutting.
+9% Double rewards While doing Woodcutting.
+34% Find bird nests While doing Woodcutting.

+32% Work efficiency While doing Woodcutting.
+48% Chest finding While doing Woodcutting.
+7% Double action While doing Woodcutting.
+12% Double rewards While doing Woodcutting.
+36% Find bird nests While doing Woodcutting.

+40% Work efficiency While doing Woodcutting.
+51% Chest finding While doing Woodcutting.
+16% Double action While doing Woodcutting.
+15% Double rewards While doing Woodcutting.
+38% Find bird nests While doing Woodcutting.

Uses

Job Boards

Hydrilium hatchet can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Reward
Vastalume job board Vastalume 4 +2  Syrenthia Faction Reputation
